downloadTitle: Microsoft Streets and Trips 2008 Construction Update
downloadDescription: Download the latest construction data to keep your maps current.
detailsSection: Download the latest road construction data to keep your Streets and Trips 2008 maps current.
installInstructionSection:
1. Close Streets & Trips.

  2. Click the download link to start the download.

  3. Click Save or Save this program to disk.

  4. Save the file in the Data folder
    • For XP
      C:\Documents and Settings\<User>\Local Settings\Application Data\Microsoft\Microsoft Streets & Trips\15.0\Data

      NOTE:       <User> in the path string is the username logged into the computer.

    • For Vista
      C:\Users\<User>\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Microsoft Streets & Trips\15.0\Data
  5. Restart Streets & Trips.
